posts.post_title: F/S T206 Molly Miller Southern League Old Mill - SOLD~!
posts.post_content:
Hey All!

SOLD~!  thanks for your interest.

 Dlvd Molly Miller southern league old mill, crazy back mis-cut and blue stamp. Graded SGC MIS.  Any form of payment accepted.  Would trade for a T206 Abbaticchio Brown Sleeves (working on a back run) I can send my want list if requested.  pictures below.  please PM or email offers or if you have any additional questions.  

thanks!

Cliff
